Name: Subject OrganisationDisabled
Body: {system}: Volunteer Deployment of {volunteer_id} has been Approved

Name: Message Organisation
Body: Volunteer {volunteer_id} {volunteer_name} has been Approved for a Deployment to {organisation} from {start} to {end}.

Body: Your Deployment to {organisation} from {start} to {end} has been Approved.
